official_title: A bill to amend section 241 of the National Housing Act to provide supplemental loans for hospitals.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to allow the Federal Housing Administration to insure supplemental loans for hospitals.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 241 of the National Housing Act to provide supplemental loans for hospitals.
